website_summaries.verdict: The Saucony Breakthru 2 is a versatile shoe that was built using high quality technologies. Its construction allows for an easy transition from softer running shoes to much firmer ones with its firm yet responsive midsole. Most of the materials and construction are pretty similar to its previous version, with a slight change in the upper. It is an affordable shoe for running but it a worthwhile choice.
pros: Its responsive low-type of cushioning is admired greatly by many neutral runners who already tested it
Its outsole is still amazing for many runners who love the softer IBR and XT-900 carbon rubber
It is light enough for tempo runs
Many runners find it stiffer, offering a firmer and more responsive ride
Stability is enhanced with the POWERGRID to distribute and reduce impact
There is no bulky overlay observed with the Breakthru 2’s new FlexFilm over the toe box
Stylish use of the reflective material is an attractive design for many testers
cons: Some testers find messy stitching on top of the sole when the insole is pulled up
Durability is not reliable as the FlexFilm wears out easily, making it ideal only for training and other routines

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and great for walking and pretend
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow heel and this model of Saucony does not slide off the heel nor crimp my toes. They are comfortable and great for walking and pretend, aspirational jogging. The available, garish, god awful colors are not to my 70 year old tastes. Perhaps I'd grow a Mohawk and just go with it, but alas I am bald.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Solid
customer_reviews.text: These made it through training for an the completion of the NYC marathon. I had to dispose of them after the race because the sweat and mud that pooled in them during the rainy run caused an unholy stench. Were it not for that, I’d still be running in them. The fit is significantly different from the Kinvara, which is my preferred shoe. These provided an easier heel-to-toe offset that my injured chilies needed. The toe box is large and I could never get them on just right to completely forget about them, but they kept me injury free for as long as I had them.
customer_reviews.author: pTym

customer_reviews.title: Nice Daily trainer
customer_reviews.text: Gone on 4 runs between 4&10 miles since purchased. Have been running in Kinvarna's, and had blistering problems with the last 3 pairs so I've moved on. This is a light shoe with a very roomy toe box, the heel cup design is very different than the kninvarna, and this is where I had problems. No issue what so ever with heel slip. Compared to the kinvarna, they initially felt a little chunky, but I've quickly adjusted. Hopefully, Saucony will not progress this into a completely different shoe as they make changes. This seems to be the trend.
customer_reviews.author: CoachB

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and fit. But very mad that the shoes were used and had damage to decals and couldn't get a replacement nor a cut in the price I paid... not happy with Amazon or the seller of this product.... I only where saucony's for work because they are comfortable and I love the vibrant colors!!! and really wanted these shoes but refused to pay the $$$ for used and damaged product and could not get a new product sent to me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Big Toe Box
customer_reviews.text: The Original BreakThru was too narrow, this version was quite wide - to the point of overcompensating. There is plenty of space for your toes to splay outward on landing...
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: Saucony Men's Breakthru 2 Running Shoe is light and comfortable, but needs more cushioning in forefoot.
customer_reviews.text: Saucony Men's Breakthru 2 Running Shoe is light and comfortable. The cushioning in the heal is just right, but for me, it could use some more cushioning in the forefoot.
customer_reviews.author: JU

customer_reviews.title: Love the Saucony brand
customer_reviews.text: Love the Saucony brand. This shoe is designed for race-day and performance. I would definitely buy this model again. Only use for race days or speed runs to maximize your performance.
customer_reviews.author: MavsFan_11

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected for size 11M
customer_reviews.text: Spouse likes the fit and says they should do 'the job's... if he returns to jogging (:
customer_reviews.author: KJC

customer_reviews.title: If you like the older version of Saucony, you won't be disappointed in this pair!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and feel of this shoe, I enjoy this style of Saucony shoe over the new ones, as the new ones tend to have a narrow toe box and fit is smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mark from Maple Grove

customer_reviews.title: my feet are not comfortable as long when I wear them as when I ...
customer_reviews.text: While these fit very well.....my feet are not comfortable as long when I wear them as when I wear other Saucony shoes.
customer_reviews.author: boss99

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Great running shoes. Saucony shoes are the best.
customer_reviews.author: flyrod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Really comfortable and no need to break them in!
customer_reviews.author: VN

customer_reviews.title: They always fit him perfectly & are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My 6'8 son loves this brand of shoes. They always fit him perfectly & are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: susan stafford

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Always fit, great shoes, use for workout and hiking trails on Oregon.
customer_reviews.author: Elliote

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I exersize daily and work on my feet. I use there for both. I only wish they had more bold colors.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: 5in of toes space which is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 10.5 with saucony, but for this model i went a size down and i still have .5in of toes space which is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Orange is the new AWESOME.
customer_reviews.text: They had me at the orange color. Fits great. Very light. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is a little too narrow. I wish the shoe would have come in a wide "2E"
customer_reviews.author: Don Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great color (Amazon pic is wrong) and solid shoe as always, Saucony.
customer_reviews.author: YThunderCat

customer_reviews.title: Tread falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Tread of both shoes falling apart after 2 months of only wearing yo work.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Bowie

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for running and gym class!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a pair of "gym only" shoes for my HIIT classes with cool OSU Beaver colors. I need a neutral padded shoe which this so far is great. Lots of nice padding for running and jumping, fits securely on my feet, and the bright Beaver Orange is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. Rome

customer_reviews.title: Two Strikes
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair that I ordered. First pair was too small. Ordered the next size up. The new pair were both men's 12.5, however one shoe was constructed different than the other; wider toe box and looser overall fit. Will return and give up on the breakthru.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: soft feel and nice look
customer_reviews.text: love the soft feel and the bright color. i wish the lower sides had been a darker color but the feel is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wandtke

customer_reviews.title: These came to fit me a half size larger than ...
customer_reviews.text: These came to fit me a half size larger than i expected. I usually wear a 7.5 in the kinvaras.
customer_reviews.author: Jrunner

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the fit of these shoes. The Breakthru 2 shoes have a very wide toe box and no mid sole lateral support compared to the Saucony Guide 9's I was wearing previously. Shoes felt comfortable but was swimming in them. Felt even longer in length than the Guide 9's in the same size as well. Uppers did not seem like they would wear well. Thank goodness for Amazon's excellent return policy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes
customer_reviews.text: After trying on 10 or so similar shoes I got fitted for these by a highly-recommended local running store, and they've made a big difference for me. Your mileage may very, but the neutral design, wider toe-box and snug rear fit have really helped extend my runs by making my feet much more comfortable. I'm about 50 miles into these, and they've only improved with age.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hammons

product_meta.title: Saucony Breakthru 2 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Saucony Breakthru 2 Beat your PR every time you run in the Breakthru 2 Upper - Breathable Structure The Breakthru 2 from Saucony is formed from a soft, breathable Mesh construction that allows air to permeate the interior layers to keep the foot cool and comfortable as you power through each stride. This is unified with an internal RUNDRY Collar Lining which secures the heel while wicking moisture away from the surface of the skin allowing the foot to stay dry and the wearer more focused. Merged over to secure the mesh in place, flexfilm overlays supports the mesh structure from torsion and any sharp vigorous movements. It wraps and cradles, hugging the foot in all the right places without ever getting in the way for superior support and comfort. At the forefoot an Open Toe Box design is seamless and offers superior comfort, further augmenting a sock-like feel. Midsole - Responsive Compound The Midlayer foam compound of the Breakthru 2 utilises heel-to-toe POWERGRID cushioning. This proprietary midsole component combines shock dissipating GRID technology with Powerfoam material to create a cushioned and a responsive ride. POWERGRID is a lightweight, ultra-premium cushioning foam that, ounce for ounce, delivers a smoother and more rebound-filled ride than the competition. This midsole engineering works parrallel with the full length SSL EVA, which is Saucony's premium midsole material for lightweight comfort, rebound and durability with superior impact protection. The Breakthru 2 is set with Saucony 8mm offset Technology, this is where Cushioning is distributed more evenly between the heel and forefoot in shoes with an 8mm offset. The result? Your body stays in a more balanced and comfortable position with every foot strike. Outsole - Ground Gripping Carbon The outsole platform for the Saucony Breakthru 2 is constructed with a blown XT-900 compound throughout. This is a carbon rubber material that offers durable traction and control, helping the wearer d
feature_bullets: Road running shoe with chevron-knit mesh and seamless overlays
